document_data.name: Harp of War
document_data.mainbody: '''''Harp of war''''' was a powerful [[Divine magic|divine]] [[alteration]] and [[evocation]] [[spell]] used by priests devoted to [[Milil]], enabling them to create a [[harp]] of glowing force.
document_data.Effects:
The weightless magical harp created by this spell hung in the air near the caster, leaving them free to cast other spells if desired. The harp could only be played by the caster and each pluck of the strings triggered a power. The ''harp of war'' had the following powers:

* ''[[shatter]]'' nonmagical metal items within {{SI|20|ft}}
* ''[[teleport]]'' all [[magic item]]s within {{SI|40|ft}} to a random location in [[Faer√ªn]]
* shoot a ''[[lightning bolt]]'' at a single target
* ''[[teleport without error]]'' targets selected by the caster within {{SI|20|ft}} to a desired location
* unleash a ''[[flame strike]]'' on a single target within {{SI|70|ft}}

Variations in the ''harp of war's'' powers depended on the incantation. Each temple of Milil had their own unique versions of this spell.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as a [[material component]] a thin strand of [[silver]] wire  to cast.
